body: Book any tour through Captain Jack’s Tours and you will qualify for our special "Low" hotel rate. You will need to call our office to take advantage of this offer. Hotel accommodations are at the newly remodeled La Quinta Inn & Suites. It includes an over-sized room, heated pool, beautiful garden grounds and is located in downtown Santa Barbara. Breakfast, WI-FI & free parking are ‘included’ in this package – this package is limited in availability. Book any tour with Captain Jack’s tours….and save with our special room rate Only $149 per night Oct 15th – March 14th Only $169 March 15th - Oct 14th (plus taxes and fees). Ask for more details.
title: Hotel and Tour Special
